info.title: Laravel Ticket Booking API
info.description: API for ticket booking system with event management and reservations

message.example: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter events by status (upcoming, ongoing, completed)

200.description: Reset link sent (always returns 200 for security)

message.example: If the email exists in our system, a password reset link has been sent.

422.description: Validation error or business logic error

409.description: Conflict - Event sold out or version mismatch
Conflict - Version mismatch or insufficient tickets
